name: LockdownLogic
0:
”Alexa turn on my Lockdown Plug”
”Alexa turn off my Lockdown Plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Lockdown Logic skill allows you to control Lockdown Logic devices via an Amazon Alexa smart speaker. In order to link this skill to your Amazon account you must have a Lockdown Logic account. Then you must have added Alexa compatiable Lockdown devices through the Lockdown Logic app.
